content.rendered:
Directed By Hitesh Bhatia

Written by Hitesh Bhatia. Supratik Sen

Star Rishi Kapoor (Brij Gopal ‘B. G.’ Sharma). Paresh Rawal (Brij Gopal ‘B. G.’ Sharma). Juhi Chawla (Mrs. Manchanda). Isha Talwar (Urmi Kaul). Sheeba Chaddha (Manju Gulati). Madhu Anand Chandhock (Mrs. Kalra). Nirmala J. Chandra (Nikki). Amar Chaudhary (Bhalla). Ashok Chhabra (Mrs. Gulati’s Father-in-Law). Solanki Diwakar (Fruit Vendor). Vijay Kumar Dogra (Sub-Inspector Pratap). Pari Dubashi (Sneha). Ram Singh Fakoti (Telemarketer on T. V.). Nehpal Gautam (Vishnu). Satish Kaushik (K. K. Chaddha). Sanjay Kota (Prison Inmate). Deepak Kriplani (M. D. Sikka). Mukesh Kumar (Sub-Inspector of Police). Suparna Marwah (Mrs. Kaul (Urmi’s mother)). Gautam Mehrishi (Chef on T. V.). Sherry Mehta (Chef in YouTube video). Dipti Misra (Poonam Goel). Vikas Mohla (Ashu). Mohit Mukherjee (Ranjan). Suhail Nayyar (Rinku). Gufi Paintal (Rajendra Sharma). Pramod Pandey (Hasyakavi on T. V.). Sulagna Panigrahi (Aarti Bhatia). Shiwangi Peswani (Preeti Nangia). Poonam (Aarti’s helper). Taaruk Raina (Vincy). Ayesha Raza Mishra (Rupali Dhingra). Akashdeep Manmohan Sabir (Builder Jain). Komal Sachdeva (Beautician). Niraj Sah (Mishra). Goraksha Sakpal (Presswala’s Son). Anjuman Saxena (Sushil Bua). Parmeet Sethi (Robbie Sachdeva). Daksh Shadev (Shopkeeper at Cake Shop). Annu Sharma (Tuition Kid’s Mother). Monu Sharma (Cyber Café Guy). Raajeshwari Arora (Lady Police Constable). Shishir Sharma (Mr. Kaul (Urmi’s father)). Mahendra Shrivas (Presswala). Sangeeta Shrivastava (Late Mrs. B. G. Sharma). Jaspreet Singh (Cop Driver). Taranjot Singh (Chaddha’s Grandson). Sirat (Mishra’s Granddaughter 2). Shivani Sopori (Indoo Sharma (as Shivaani Sopuri)). Yashwant Suryavanshi (Security Guard at Jain’s office). Kartikesh Thakur (Peon at Madhuban Factory). Suraj Thapa (Urmi’s helper). Rajeev Tiwari (Awasthi). Ishan Tripathi (Sidharth Sharma). Shubhankar Tripathi (Bittoo). Shrikant Verma (Sho). Gulshan Walia (Animesh). Sultan Warsi (Waiter). Heroxicated Armaan (Armaan). Uday Atrolia (MCD Officer). Garvitt Attri (Tution Kid). Taran Bajaj (Parminder)

Language Hindi

Producers Farhan Akhtar. Abhishek Chaubey. Kassim Jagmagia. Chetana Kowshik. Niraj Kumar Pandey. Vishal Ramchandani. Ayush Saini. Ravi Sarin. Ritesh Sidhwani. Honey Trehan

Production Excel Entertainment. MacGuffin Pictures. Sony Pictures International Productions
